faqs.title: What is this app for?
faqs.body: This application is designed to help users organize, track, and manage their daily tasks and goals. It allows you to create to-do lists, set reminders, and monitor progress in an intuitive and visually engaging interface.

faqs.title: How do I reset my password?
faqs.body: To reset your password, go to the login page and click on 'Forgot password?'. You will be prompted to enter your registered email address, and a reset link will be sent to you. Follow the link to create a new password.

faqs.title: Can I use the app offline?
faqs.body: Yes, you can access and edit most of your data offline. Any changes you make while offline will be automatically synced with our servers once you reconnect to the internet, ensuring a seamless experience.

faqs.title: Is my data secure?
faqs.body: Absolutely. All data transmitted between your device and our servers is encrypted using TLS 1.3. We also store your data using AES-256 encryption at rest to ensure the highest level of protection.

faqs.title: How do I delete my account?
faqs.body: To delete your account, navigate to Settings > Account > Delete Account. You will be asked to confirm your decision, and once confirmed, your data will be permanently removed from our servers within 30 days.

faqs.title: Does the app have a dark mode?
faqs.body: Yes, the app includes both light and dark themes. You can switch between them manually in Settings > Appearance, or set it to follow your system theme automatically.

faqs.title: Can I export my data?
faqs.body: Yes. You can export your data anytime from Settings > Data Export. The export file is provided in CSV format so that you can easily import it into other applications or keep it for personal backup.

faqs.title: How do I contact support?
faqs.body: You can contact our support team by using the in-app Support form under Settings > Help or by sending an email to support@example.com. We typically respond within one business day.

faqs.title: Is there a mobile version?
faqs.body: Yes, the app is available for both iOS and Android devices. You can download it from the App Store or Google Play and sign in with your existing account to sync your data across platforms.

faqs.title: How do I enable notifications?
faqs.body: To enable notifications, allow the app to send alerts in your device settings, then configure notification preferences inside the app under Settings > Notifications. You can choose reminders, updates, and system alerts.

faqs.title: Can multiple users share an account?
faqs.body: For security and privacy reasons, each user must maintain their own account. Shared accounts are not supported, but we offer team plans that allow collaboration and shared project access.

faqs.title: Does the app support integrations?
faqs.body: Yes, the app integrates with popular tools like Google Calendar, Slack, and Trello. You can connect or disconnect these integrations from Settings > Integrations at any time.

faqs.title: Is there a premium version?
faqs.body: A premium plan is available that offers advanced analytics, priority syncing, and extended storage. Premium subscribers also receive early access to new features and priority support.

faqs.title: How do I upgrade my plan?
faqs.body: You can upgrade by visiting Settings > Billing and choosing a subscription tier that fits your needs. The upgrade takes effect immediately, and you’ll gain access to all premium features right away.

faqs.title: What happens if I cancel my subscription?
faqs.body: If you cancel, your premium features remain active until the end of your current billing cycle. After that, your account will revert to the free tier, but your data will remain intact.

faqs.title: How do I change my email address?
faqs.body: To change your email, go to Settings > Account Info and update your address. You’ll receive a verification email at your new address to confirm the change before it takes effect.

faqs.title: Can I recover deleted items?
faqs.body: Yes, deleted items are stored in the Trash folder for 30 days. You can restore any item during that period. After 30 days, items are permanently deleted from our system.

faqs.title: How do I sync across devices?
faqs.body: Simply log into the app using the same account on any supported device. Your tasks, preferences, and data will sync automatically through our secure cloud infrastructure.

faqs.title: Does the app collect analytics data?
faqs.body: We collect limited anonymized analytics data to understand app usage patterns and improve performance. You can disable analytics in Settings > Privacy if you prefer not to share usage data.

faqs.title: Where can I find tutorials?
faqs.body: Comprehensive video tutorials and written guides are available in our Help Center. Visit help.example.com for detailed walkthroughs on using features and optimizing your workflow.
